728384f-b.title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Abingdon Avenue
728384f-b.text:
Arthur Kill Road, adjoining the N.W. corner
of Abingdon Svenue, showing the ruins of the Benham
Mansion. It was the residence of Admiral Andrew Ellicott
Kennedy Benham which was destroyed by fire in 1897.
May 1, 1925
Views 1, 2
P.L. Soerr
NO RPRODUCTIONS
728384f-b.folder: Arthur Kill Road & Abingdon Avenue, Staten Island, NY

728362f-a.text:
(1)
600 Arthur Kill Road, south side, between Abingdon
and Brookfield Aves., showing the Metcalfe homestead.
1924
P.L.Sperr

(2)
A full front view of the house.
June 17, 1924
By William T. Luvis through P.L.Sperr.

728363f-b.title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Abingdon Avenue
728363f-b.text:
651 Arthur Eill Road, west of the N.W. corner
of Abingdon Avenue, showing the Benham-Seaman home.
P. L. Sperr states that part of the house is about 200
Mears old. The view is northward.
May 1, 1926
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODOCTIONS
(s)
A view of the rear of the house.
April 28, 1925
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(3)
Viewing the house from the north.
My 30, 1927
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS

728364f-b.title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Abingdon Avenue
728364f-b.text:
(1)
651 Arthur Kill Road, west of the N.W. corner of Abingdon
Ave., showing the south end of Benham-Seaman House. P. L. Sperr
states that part of the house is about two hundred years old.
April 7, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
A view of the north end of the house.
April 7, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
